title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 151-4.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 151-4.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

Waiver agreement, in this Subpart, means any agreement entered into between an insurer, self-insured employer, or the State Insurance Fund and the New York State Workers' Compensation Board pursuant to Workers' Compensation Law section 32(i)(2) and (3). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
§§
151-4.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
